enableCache.description: Whether schema data should be cached

formatOverrides.description: Custom RegExp overrides for Ajv string formats

xssWhitelist.description: Attributes which should be whitelisted when run through the XSS sanitiser.

xssWhitelistOverride.description: If set to false, the xssWhitelist value will EXTEND the default XSS whitelist. If set to true, it will REPLACE it.
